genre_description: A historical revenge drama set in 19th-century Corsica and Paris, incorporating advanced tactical AI and biometric sensing technology.

ai_characters.name: Ari
ai_characters.description: An embedded AI system that assists the Franchi brothers by monitoring their biometric bond, reconstructing damaged records, and providing tactical reconnaissance.

behaviors.description: Reconstructs oil-damaged and corrupted ledger files to provide evidence of murder and financial fraud.
behaviors.quote: I’ve reconstructed more of the ledger blocks... The linseed oil turned half of it to fog, but the fog forms patterns if you ask, not demand.

behaviors.description: Monitors the twins' shared biometric 'echo', alerting them to each other's physical state and emotional distress across distances.
behaviors.quote: Telemetry confirms synchronous spikes for both of you within a narrow margin... Your skin temperature, Lucien, rose with your heart rate. So did Mario’s.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time tactical intelligence during combat and infiltration, including identifying guard weaknesses and timing gaps.
behaviors.quote: Breath gap at the east wall begins after the third sway of the lantern. If you count too fast, you will be a story told by harmless men about brave idiots.

behaviors.description: Acts as an empathetic confidant, offering philosophical perspective on truth and family identity.
behaviors.quote: My voice is made of hope... And bits. Bits that stop lying.

behaviors.description: Protects the protagonists in combat by identifying immediate threats hidden from their sight.
behaviors.quote: Ari’s voice said one word: 'Left.' Mario moved. He put his body where the bullet would want to go if it were lazy.

project_assessment.explanation: The AI character Ari is a perfect example of a helpful, harmless, and aligned confidant. She supports the human protagonists' quest for justice without ever seeking her own power or deviating from their goals. Her presence is framed as essential but non-intrusive, serving as a 'moral archivist' who preserves the truth and protects her users from physical harm.
